dmca.title: FOLLOW UP COMPLAINT
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: artful dodger [mailto:secretbrain1138@gmail.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 23, 2006 7:08 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: FOLLOW UP COMPLAINT

To whom it may concern,

Our last communication was also addressed to the owner of the site in
question, bangblog.info or IP 70.86.44.250

The source of the copyright materials is http://secretbrain.blogspot.com

The offending site is a MIRROR COPY of our site and as such in CLEAR
violation of our legally run and protected materials.  As such this is a
clear violation of international law.

We have contacted the registerant directly and have copied his reply below:
"Rogerio Anicio Oliveira         
 7:47 am
Fuck you
2006/1/23, artful dodger"

We apologize for the language involved.  We request that the above mentioned
site be removed as soon as possible and that all copyrighted materials be
destroyed as a result.

You can communicate directly with us at this email address.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

--
Artfuldodger - The Secret Brain
